mapper.select: SELECT busLineDetail.LINE_DTL_ID , busLineDetail.BOARD_TM , busLineDetail.BOARD_LOC , busLineDetail.BOARD_ORDER , busLineDetailHist.HIST_DATE as BOARD_HIST_DATE , stdu.USER_ID , stdu.USER_NM , stdu.IMG_SRC , cls.CLS_NM , busLineStudenHist.UNB_REASON , busLineStudenHist.BOARD_DIV FROM PRESCH_LINE busLine JOIN PRESCH_LINE_DTL busLineDetail ON busLine.LINE_ID = busLineDetail.LINE_ID JOIN MAP_LINE_STDU rel ON busLineDetail.LINE_DTL_ID = rel.LINE_DTL_ID JOIN VIEW_USER_BASE stdu ON rel.STDU_ID = stdu.USER_ID JOIN PRESCH_CLASS cls ON stdu.CLS_ID = cls.CLS_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM PRESCH_LINE_DTL_HIST WHERE HIST_DATE = #{histDate}) busLineDetailHist ON rel.LINE_DTL_ID = busLineDetailHist.LINE_DTL_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM PRESCH_LINE_STDU_HIST WHERE HIST_DATE = #{histDate}) busLineStudenHist ON rel.LINE_DTL_ID = busLineStudenHist.LINE_DTL_ID AND rel.STDU_ID = busLineStudenHist.USER_ID WHERE busLine.LINE_ID = #{lineId}

SELECT detail.* FROM PRESCH_LINE_DTL detail LEFT JOIN PRESCH_LINE_DTL_HIST hist ON detail.LINE_DTL_ID = hist.LINE_DTL_ID AND hist.HIST_DATE = #{histDate} WHERE detail.LINE_ID = #{lineId} AND hist.LINE_DTL_HIST_ID IS NULL ORDER BY BOARD_ORDER

SELECT /* 탑승 노선 정보 조회 (학생 Id) */ * FROM PRESCH_LINE busLine JOIN PRESCH_LINE_DTL busLineDetail ON busLine.LINE_ID = busLineDetail.LINE_ID WHERE busLine.LINE_TYPE = 'ATT' AND busLineDetail.STDU_ID = #{studentId} LIMIT 1

SELECT /* 하차 노선 정보 조회 (학생 Id) */ * FROM PRESCH_LINE busLine JOIN PRESCH_LINE_DTL busLineDetail ON busLine.LINE_ID = busLineDetail.LINE_ID WHERE busLine.LINE_TYPE = 'COM' AND busLineDetail.STDU_ID = #{studentId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRESCH_LINE_DTL_HIST (LINE_DTL_ID, HIST_DATE, CREATED_DT, CREATED_BY) VALUES (#{lineDtlId}, #{histDate}, NOW(), #{createdBy});

INSERT INTO PRESCH_LINE_STDU_HIST (LINE_DTL_ID, USER_ID, HIST_DATE, BOARD_DIV, UNB_REASON, CREATED_DT, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_DT, UPDATED_BY) VALUES (#{lineDtlId}, #{userId}, #{histDate}, #{boardDiv}, #{unbReason}, NOW(), #{createdBy}, NOW(), #{createdBy})
